properties.name: custom_anchor_tags
properties.description: Comma-separated list of custom comment tags to highlight (e.g., PERF, SECURITY, DEBT). These are recognized in addition to built-in tags like TODO, HACK, NOTE, BUG, FIXME, UNDONE, REVIEW.

properties.name: custom_anchor_tag_prefixes
properties.description: Comma-separated list of optional prefix characters for comment tags (e.g., @, $). When set, '// @TODO' is treated the same as '// TODO'. Prefixes are stripped from display in Code Anchors.
